products.title: Skye Grace Ivory (Blackout)
products.description: The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window. Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit velux, rooflite, keylite, fakro and dakstra roof windows. Offering optimum light control each blind can be positioned effortlessly to sit at any desired point within the side channels. All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.

products.description: The splash oyster light filtering skylight blind is a very light, natural cream colour perfect for a skylight window. This neutral tone will work well in most spaces. The blind comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework which is also available in a white colour. Their skylight blinds also have the option to include a control rod for those more difficult to reach windows. As with all their made to measure products this blind will come with a 5 year guarantee for extra peace of mind.
